Package deco2800.thomas.renderers

Interface Renderable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractEntity, AgentEntity, Enemy, EnemyPath, EnemyPeon, GrassTuft, Peon, PlayerPeon, Rock, StaticEntity, Tree
public interface Renderable
An object that can be rendered on the screen. Renderables should have a texture that they can return when asked using the onRender function. Textures should be size suitable to the game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    float getCol()
    Gets the col coordinate of the renderable object
    float getColRenderLength()
    Gets the length of the renderable in the x direction
    int getHeight()
    Getter for the height coordinate of the renderable object
    float getRow()
    Getter for the row coordinate of the renderable object
    float getRowRenderLength()
    Gets the length of the renderable in the y direction
    java.lang.String getTexture()
    Renderables must impliment the onRender function.

  • Method Details

    • getTexture

      java.lang.String getTexture()
      Renderables must impliment the onRender function. This function allows the current rendering system to request a texture from the object being rendered. Returning null will render an error image in this items place.
      Returns:
      The texture to be rendered onto the screen

    • getCol

      float getCol()
      Gets the col coordinate of the renderable object
      Returns:
      the col coordinate of the object

    • getRow

      Getter for the row coordinate of the renderable object
      Returns:
      the row coordinate of the object

      Returns:
      the height coordinate of the object

    • getColRenderLength

      Gets the length of the renderable in the x direction
      Returns:

    • getRowRenderLength

      float getRowRenderLength()
      Gets the length of the renderable in the y direction
